title: Noam Chomsky talks US/International Politics, Notorious RBG, Talks Youth Mentoring and Taking Action
description: The great scholar Noam Chomsky, Professor, Philosopher, Cognitive Scientist, Dissident and Friend of Nature & Humanity, discusses matters of the moment, including President Trump, the state of politics in the USA, Central/South American affairs, Mentoring and actions YOU can take to make a difference in an overwhelming world 'racing to the precipice of destruction.
